What happens to the funds that are not paid to referrers when creating an identity on the Verus network?
Any funds that are not paid to referrers when creating an identity on the Verus network go to miners or stakers of the blockchain.

- 20 VRSC to the referrer’s ID
- 20 VRSC to the referrer’s referrer’s ID
- 20 VRSC to the referrer’s referrer’s referrer’s ID
- 20 VRSC to the miner of the block in which the ID is mined100% of all funds that are not paid to referrers go to miners or stakers of the blockchain.## To create an identity:
